name: Dynamite Billard
description:
Playing billard with sticks is for cavemen, use dynamite instead!

Made in a day for Berlin Mini Jam in January 2021.

Collaboration with Hagen Sparka https://itch.io/profile/thisissparka

Controls:

 - A & D: Turn the camera

 - 1, 2 & 3: Select explosion size

 - Space bar: Next player's move

 - R: Restart
